card.text: Target player reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card from it. That player puts that card into their library third from the top. Each player draws a card.

card.text: When World Fracture enters, create a 1/1 white Phyrexian Soldier creature token. Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, you gain 1 life. Whenever a creature you don’t control dies its controller loses 1 life.
